about_the_game:
FukTopia 5 is a frantic post apocalyptic Top Down game.

Procedural Level Generation

Each level is orocedural with random elements so you will be faced with unique levels each time you play.

The fast-paced action is spiced up with a beautiful art found throughout the procedural level generation each time you play.



Gameplay
The player enter into a procedural generated level and need to clear the entire level from enemies to go to the next level.


Features and Content
  • One Character to choose and play
  • Levels with different themes and enemies
  • All level are procedurally and ramdomly generated to add more randomness to each gameplay ( Every game is different - random levels ).
  • Amazing Pixel Art

Minimum:
  • OS: Linux or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
